questions.question: 1. How does Angular 4 improved error handling, when an error is caused by something in a template?
choices: B. By creating flattened versions of Angular modules
C. By generating source maps in terms of original template

questions.question: 2. The . . . . . decorator allows us to define the pipe name that is globally available for use in any template in the across application.
5. How would you display a list of Employees on a webpage along with where they were in the list?
choices: A. Loop through and print the index
B. Loop through and print the employees
C. Loop through and print the index and the employee
D. Pass both the index and the employee to a web service

questions.question: 6. If you chain multiple pipes together, they are executed
choices: C. in the order in which you specify them

questions.question: 7. We can subscribe to an observable using the . . . . . . . . The benefit of this is that Angular deals with your subscription during the lifecycle of a component. Angular will automatically subscribe and unsubscribe for you.
8. The number pipe is location sensitive, which means that the same format argument will produce differently formatted results based on the . . . . . . .
9. How would you retrieve a list of items from a server's URL?
choices: B. Use the HTTP get method
C. Create a get SQL statement
